---

## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Motivation
Why is this feature needed? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution
How should this feature work? Include:
- API design (if applicable)
- Configuration changes
- Integration with existing code

## Model Request (if applicable)
- **Model Name:** [e.g., InceptionTime, PatchTST]
- **Model Family:** [e.g., neural, boosting, ensemble]
- **Input Type:** [e.g., tabular (2D), sequence (3D)]
- **Reference Paper:** [link or citation]
- **Expected Training Time:** [e.g., 30 mins on RTX 4070 Ti]

## Feature Engineering Request (if applicable)
- **Feature Category:** [e.g., momentum, volatility, microstructure]
- **Timeframe:** [e.g., 5min, 15min, 1h]
- **Dependencies:** [list required indicators]

## Alternatives Considered
What other approaches did you consider?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, code examples, or screenshots.
